stories.title: Expand Home Directory
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand the 'Home' directory so that I can view its contents

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the UI is loaded, When I click on the expand icon next to 'Home', Then the folders 'Desktop', 'Documents', and 'Downloads' should be visible

stories.title: Expand Documents Folder
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand the 'Documents' folder so that I can view its subdirectories

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Home' directory is expanded, When I click on the expand icon next to 'Documents', Then the 'WorkSpace' and 'Office' folders should be visible

stories.title: Expand WorkSpace Folder
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand the 'WorkSpace' folder so that I can view its contents

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Documents' folder is expanded, When I click on the expand icon next to 'WorkSpace', Then the files 'React', 'Angular', and 'Veu' should be visible

stories.title: Expand Downloads Folder
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand the 'Downloads' folder so that I can view its contents

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Home' directory is expanded, When I click on the expand icon next to 'Downloads', Then the files 'Word File.doc' and 'Excel File.doc' should be visible

stories.title: Expand Office Folder
stories.description: As a user, I want to expand the 'Office' folder so that I can view its contents

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the 'Documents' folder is expanded, When I click on the expand icon next to 'Office', Then the files 'Public', 'Private', 'Classified', and 'General' should be visible
